name: @dangahagan/weather-mcp
description: MCP server providing weather data from NOAA and Open-Meteo APIs. Supports forecasts, current conditions, and historical weather data (1940-present) with no API keys required.

tools.name: check_service_status
tools.description: Check the operational status of NOAA and Open-Meteo weather APIs

tools.name: get_forecast
tools.description: Get 7-day weather forecasts for US locations via NOAA API

tools.name: get_current_conditions
tools.description: Get current weather conditions for US locations via NOAA API

tools.name: get_historical_weather
tools.description: Get historical weather data from 1940-present globally (NOAA for last 7 days US only, Open-Meteo for older dates worldwide)
